title: DataPointModel
description: Data point additional configuration model. Inherits all properties from OpcNodeModel and adds a publishingInterval property that adapts OpcPublishingInterval.

OpcSamplingInterval.description: Server-side sampling rate in milliseconds. Should be <= OpcPublishingInterval.

OpcSamplingIntervalTimespan.description: Server-side sampling rate as a TimeSpan (e.g., '00:00:00.100').

DataSetFieldId.description: Custom identifier for this node in dataset messages. Must be unique within a dataset writer.

DataSetClassFieldId.description: Unique identifier for correlating fields with dataset class metadata.

QueueSize.description: Size of the server-side queue for this monitored item.

DiscardNew.description: Controls queue overflow behavior for monitored items.

DataChangeTrigger.description: Specifies what triggers value change notifications.

DeadbandType.description: Deadband type of the data change filter to apply.

DeadbandValue.description: Deadband value of the data change filter to apply.

EventFilter.description: Event Filter to apply. When specified the node is assumed to be an event notifier node to subscribe to.

AttributeId.description: The OPC UA attribute to monitor on the node.

IndexRange.description: Range specification for array or string values.

HeartbeatBehavior.description: Controls heartbeat message generation for this node.

SkipFirst.description: Controls handling of initial value notification.

UseCyclicRead.description: Use periodic reads instead of monitored items.

RegisterNode.description: Optimize node access using RegisterNodes service.

FetchDisplayName.description: Retrieve node's DisplayName attribute on startup.

ModelChangeHandling.description: Configuration for model change tracking nodes.

CyclicReadMaxAge.description: Maximum age for cached values in cyclic reads (ms).

CyclicReadMaxAgeTimespan.description: Maximum age for cached values in cyclic reads as TimeSpan.

publishingInterval.description: Adapted publishing interval property. Sets or gets OpcPublishingInterval.

EventFilterModel.description: Event filter for OPC UA event monitoring.

typeDefinitionId.description: Simple event Type definition node id.

ContentFilterModel.description: Content filter for event filtering (structure not detailed in provided context).

updateInterval.description: Time interval for sending pending interval updates in seconds.

snapshotInterval.description: Time interval for sending pending interval snapshot in seconds.

ModelChangeHandlingOptionsModel.description: Describes how model changes are published.
